risk_factors.phishing_risk: Increases risk surface in case of phishing

info.description: Because signatures are not stored on the blockchain, there is no way for Revoke.cash to know if you signed any signatures. So this page contains a list of known marketplaces and a list of your tokens that support offchain Permit signatures. Only if you know that you signed an offchain signature on a scam website, you need to cancel the potential signatures on this page, otherwise you are wasting transaction fees. When you cancel potential signatures for a token or marketplace, they will remain in the list but cannot be cancelled again for some time.

marketplaces.active_approvals: {count, plural, =1 {1 active approval} other {# active approvals}}
marketplaces.none_found: No marketplaces with active approvals found.

tooltips.acknowledge_signature_notice: Please acknowledge the notice before checking your signatures.
tooltips.connect_wallet: Please connect your wallet to continue
tooltips.connected_account: You can only perform actions for the connected account
tooltips.involved_in_exploits: This address is involved in the following exploits:
tooltips.marketplace_listings: This will cancel all current listings and offers on {marketplace}.
tooltips.marketplace_signatures: Once approved, marketplaces are able to move assets on your behalf. Bad actors exploit these approvals to create zero-priced listings on third party websites. Cancel these if you signed a marketplace signature on a phishing website.
tooltips.old_approval: This approval is over a year old. Consider revoking it if you no longer need it.
tooltips.permit2_expiration: This is a Permit2 approval that will expire {inTime}
tooltips.permit_signatures: Permit Signatures are used to grant approvals without sending a transaction. Cancel these if you signed a Permit signature on a phishing website.
tooltips.recently_cancelled: You already cancelled this potential signature recently. It will remain in the list so you can cancel it again later if you need to.
tooltips.risk_factors: This token approval is {riskLevel} for these reasons:
tooltips.switch_chain: Please switch your connected network to {chainName} inside your wallet to continue
